lore:
The Warriors of Azyr

The Stormcast Eternals are the chosen warriors of Sigmar, the God-King of Azyr. Forged in the celestial furnaces of Azyrheim, these immortal warriors are humanity's greatest champions, reforged in lightning and tempered by divine purpose.

The Reforging Process

When a mortal hero dies in service to Sigmar, their soul is captured by the Lightning Gheists and brought to the Celestial Realm. There, in the great forges of Azyrheim, they are reforged into Stormcast Eternals - their mortal flesh replaced with sigmarite, their souls bound to the will of the God-King.

Chambers and Hosts

Stormcast Eternals are organized into Chambers - specialized formations designed for specific battlefield roles. The Warrior Chambers form the backbone of the army, while Vanguard Chambers provide reconnaissance and rapid deployment capabilities.

The Price of Immortality

Each time a Stormcast Eternal falls in battle, they are reforged again. But with each reforging, they lose a piece of their humanity. Their memories fade, their emotions dull, and they become more like the divine weapons they were forged to be. This is the Curse of Reforging - the price of eternal service to Sigmar.

Spearhead Operations

The Vigilant Brotherhood stride forth as Sigmarâ€™s shining wardens against encroaching shadow. The Lord-Vigilant hunts from the saddle of his fierce Gryph-stalker, a living embodiment of divine pursuit. At his side, the Lord-Veritant wields sacred flame and scripture to expose heresy wherever it hides. Liberators hold the line in unyielding ranks while winged Prosecutors descend from the heavens, their hammers striking like thunder to cleanse the realms in Azyr's name.

armyRules.name: Shield of Azyr
armyRules.description: Pick 1 friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS unit. Until the start of your next hero phase, that unit has a ward of 5+.

armyRules.name: Storm Charge
armyRules.description: Pick 1 friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS unit that is not within 3" of any enemy units. That unit can attempt a charge even if it ran in the same turn.

effects.description: Can attempt charge even if ran this turn

regimentAbilities.description: Pick a friendly unit in combat and until the end of the phase each time a model from that unit is slain roll a D6. On a 4+ an enemy unit in combat with that unit takes 1 mortal wound.

effects.description: When models slain, roll D6, on 4+ enemy takes 1 mortal wound

regimentAbilities.name: Strike Where Needed
regimentAbilities.description: Select a unit. For this unit no mortal damage is inflicted when retreating and then can still charge this turn.
